title: 如何使用户组禁止sethome与home权限
author: Bilibili黑炽
txt_content:
一：（问题）如何使build用户组禁止sethome与home权限！！！
二： 服务器装了ess插件与权限组，mcbbs的帖子也翻过了，还是不知所措，所以不要给链接谢谢，感激不尽！
三：以下是权限组yml ， 其中build用户组的build权限我关闭了# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&5'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&4'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - plotme.limit.1
    - plotme.use
    - plotme.use.add
    - plotme.use.remove
    - quickshop.create.buy
    - quickshop.create.changepric
    - quickshop.create.sell
    - quickshop.find
    - quickshop.use
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&2'
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&c'
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - back
    - spawn
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&e'
      suffix: ''
复制代码

replies.author: ill712
replies.txt_content:
进入plugins/groupmanager，找到globalgroups.yml，
     将g:essentials_builde下的- essentials.sethome.bed删除   这样就移除了所有玩家使用床来设定出生点的权限
然后给builder组添加home的负权.限
/mangaddp builder -essentials.sethome
/mangaddp builder -essentials.home

replies.author: 阿威23333
replies.txt_content:
ess的话添加负**限，CMI同理
/mangaddp default -essentials.sethome -essentials.home
CMI默认未配置权限

replies.author: 枫林1
replies.txt_content:
如果楼主配置文件中有GroupManager的话请按接下来的方法走：
进入GroupManager\worlds\world在其中找到Builder,然后找到essentials.sethome和essentials.home然后删掉就行了。

replies.author: ZCLRGJ
replies.txt_content:
mangdelp XXX essentials.sethome 删除设家
mangdelp XXX essentials.home 删除回家 
XXX表示用户组名称 
前面需要斜杠
在服务器内直接输入即可
